casebody.data:
Timothy CLARKE, Personal Representative of the Estate of Erica Bohn
v.
Ashraf Gad Bakhom MIKHAIL, M.D.; Jessica Lyn Hardin, P.A.; and Coastal Carolina Neuropsychiatric Center, P.A. No. 29P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Gary K. Shipman, Wilmington, for Clarke, Timothy (Representative), et al. W. Cory Reiss, Wilmington, for Clarke, Timothy (Representative), et al. C. Andrew Childers, for Clarke, Timothy (Representative), et al. John D. Martin, Wilmington, for Mikhail, Ashraf Gad Bakhom (M.D.), et al. Colleen N. Shea, Wilmington, for Mikhail, Ashraf Gad Bakhom (M.D.), et al. Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, for Mikhail, Ashraf Gad Bakhom (M.D.), et al.

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 27th of January 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
